response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $8,000 by us due to its unique features, advanced technology, and unparalleled craftsmanship. We believe it could be a valuable asset for you, enhancing your capabilities or adding significant value to your collection. Considering its worth and benefits, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $7,200. Please let us know if this offer aligns with your expectations and budget, so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 7200}
